Announcing 'Saving Mikey', a Twine game for smartphones

PB80
April 2017 in Workshop
Hi Guys!

I would like to share with you the trailer of our "interactive fiction" game: Saving Mikey!


Our concept is simple: Saving Mikey is a chooseable-path adventure game built on plain text messages from a young boy, who went missing in an infected area after "Lyssa", a very dangerous rabies-like virus started to spread silently. You have to help him survive and reach the safe zone by telling him what to do when he faces different situations and threats during his journey. We mixed the classic „road trip in an apocalyptic world” genre with our all-time favourites: the interactive Fighting Fantasy books from the 80's.

The story is complete and we made it in Twine of course!



Two screenshot: the gameplay and the interactive map.



More about the story:

Epilogue: The leaked e-mails

If you are interested about the details, please visit our Kickstarter page:

Kickstarter Project: Saving Mikey

Thank you very much guys for your attention, and we hope you've liked it!
